item.description:
The Strand Theatre in Clinton is hosting 5 Monday "Fright Nights" in October. The shows start at 7:00. Let's meet outside the theater at 6:30. That gives us time to find good seats and even get a meal. If you need to reach me, my cell phone is 508-981-0455.

For information on the schedule and theater, go to http://www.strandtheatre.com/classics.shtml.

The Plot: A family moves into a haunted house, and the former residents are not happy about it.

  • October 1 - Dracula (1931)
  • October 8 - Psycho (1960)
  • October 15 - The Exorcist (1973)
  • October 22 - Poltergeist (1982)
  • October 29 - The Shining (1980)

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: Fright Night - Poltergeist
